line.comment: * Police ships chase 2 targets: 1/ Boarded ships (from the player with the 'mayhem_boardedShips' global var) 2/ Hostiles in adjacent sectors (owned, or Unknown).
* When no targets found, police defend their home sector.
* Attack boarded ships in reachable sectors.
* Attack nearby hostiles from current sector, or defend home sector. Zero Hour: cautious AI reduces range, full defense AI only allows owned sectors

sval.val: Police ships chase 2 targets: 1/ Boarded ships (from the player with the 'mayhem_boardedShips' global var) 2/ Hostiles in adjacent sectors (owned, or Unknown).
When no targets found, police defend their home sector.
Attack boarded ships in reachable sectors.
Attack nearby hostiles from current sector, or defend home sector. Zero Hour: cautious AI reduces range, full defense AI only allows owned sectors
